Key Match Events: Kohli hit two sixes off Mohammad Nawaz in the 19th over
Kohli scored 82* off 44 balls, including two sixes in the final over
Nawaz bowled a full toss to Kohli in the final over, leading to a no-ball call and byes
Arshdeep Singh removed both Pakistan openers in the early overs
Shaheen Afridi bowled a low full toss to Kohli in the 19th over
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed his disbelief at his performance
Rohit Sharma praised Kohli's innings as one of India's best in T20 cricket
Miscellaneous Highlights: More than 90,000 fans attended the match at the MCG
Kohli's innings was described as one of the greatest in T20 cricket
